title: Regles:Zero magazine Update
content:
Hello   
   
my name is Regles:Zero magazine and no, i'm not dead !   
   
My website was updated tonight and my 2nd issue will be available very soon.   
   
 [http://www.regleszero.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821135454/http:/www.regleszero.com/)   
   
I have also two more free fonts onboard !   
   
If any font designers wants to submit types to be published in the future issues, leave me a mail !   
   
-Cheers !
author: sginer
